p.d: At 40 years of age, Michel and Gérard have just lost their jobs. Despite having plenty of professional experience, the two friends have never sat the baccalaureate exam and find themselves stuck in a rut. Instead of just throwing in the towel, Michel decides to try and pass the dreaded exam. He drags Gérard off to high school with him, where among others they come across his son Philippe, who for his part couldn't care less about the exam. This crazy endeavour meets with total incomprehension from their friends and families, not to mention sarcasm from their neighbours in this small town in the Bordeaux area where people have a tendency to say nothing but to know everything! Directed by: Renaud Bertrand (France, 2005) Cast: Jacques Gamblin (Michel), Kad Merad (Gérard), Rufus (Edmond), Anne Brochet (Claire), Hélene Vincent (Jane), Valérie Kaprisky (Laurence), Edouard Collin (Philippe), Stéphanie Sokolinski (Lucie) Genre: dramatic comedy
